def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark_grey = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_yz_light_grey = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx) and is_light(z, ctx) and is_grey(z, ctx)
        check_xyz_surrounded = all([is_above(x, dot, ctx) or is_below(x, dot, ctx) or is_left(x, dot, ctx) or is_right(x, dot, ctx) for dot in [y,z]])
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark_grey
            and check_yz_light_grey
            and check_xyz_surrounded
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
